Q1. What to do if the tag I want to use is not available for selection?
A. If you want to use a tag that is not in our database, you can make a request for adding new tags through our \"About Us\" Page.
Q2. Why is it necessary to select tags to view the articles?

A. We display the articles relevant only to the tags that you have selected to get you best experience.\nFor this we need to know the subjects you like and that is where tags come in the picture.\nWe can select the specific articels and streamline the results as per your interests
Q3. Can I follow other users or see there activity on the forum?
A. Currently there is no functionality to follow other user.\nBut you can see the likes and comments added by them to the articles.\nAlso the articles you read are written by other users themselves
Q4. What are the different tags that i can select?
A. Currently the tags available for selection ar as follows:\nGame, Tutorial, Study, Fashion, Story, News, Movie, AI, Future, Book, Programming, Smartphone, Philosophy and Science.
